bill.title: Transportation Network Company Consumer Protection
bill.description: Concerning measures to increase protections for persons engaged with transportation network companies.

history.action: Introduced In House - Assigned to Business Affairs & Labor
House Committee on Business Affairs & Labor Refer Amended to House Committee of the Whole
House Second Reading Laid Over Daily - No Amendments
House Second Reading Special Order - Passed with Amendments - Committee, Floor
House Third Reading Passed - No Amendments
Introduced In Senate - Assigned to Business, Labor, & Technology
Senate Committee on Business, Labor, & Technology Refer Amended to Senate Committee of the Whole
Senate Second Reading Laid Over to 04/28/2025 - No Amendments
Senate Second Reading Laid Over Daily - No Amendments
Senate Second Reading Laid Over to 05/01/2025 - No Amendments
Senate Second Reading Laid Over Daily - No Amendments
Senate Second Reading Special Order - Laid Over to 05/05/2025 - No Amendments
Senate Second Reading Special Order - Laid Over Daily - No Amendments
Senate Second Reading Special Order - Passed with Amendments - Committee, Floor
Senate Third Reading Passed with Amendments - Floor
House Considered Senate Amendments - Result was to Concur - Repass
Signed by the Speaker of the House
Signed by the President of the Senate
Sent to the Governor
Governor Vetoed
